Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 153 in the County of Goochland, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 15.6 in the County of Alleghany, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 191.5 in the County of Rockbridge, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 66.5 in the County of Chesterfield, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-564 at mile marker 0.7 in the City of Norfolk, near Terminal Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east entrance ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 66 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right shoulder is closed.
